has research problem: End - to - end neural relation extraction

has research problem.from sentence: End - to - end neural relation extraction using deep biaffine attention

has research problem: joint extraction of named entities and relations between them

has research problem.from sentence: We propose a neural network model for joint extraction of named entities and relations between them , without any hand - crafted features .

has research problem: Extracting entities and their semantic relations from raw text

has research problem.from sentence: Extracting entities and their semantic relations from raw text is a key information extraction task .

has research problem: jointly learn to extract entities and relations

has research problem.from sentence: More recently , end - to - end systems which jointly learn to extract entities and relations have been proposed with strong potential to obtain high performance .
